channel.title: Price Help
channel.description:
[b]Prices[/b] How can I change the Prices of objects in a shop? for example; Dragon Dagger: current cost 19k Dragon Dagger: (my price) new price cost 35k just as example.
[b]Selling Price[/b] How do I make it so when you buy something and try and sell it, the sell price is lower than the buy price?
thank you [s][i]::kidd619::[/i][/s]

item.title: Price Help
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

Find item.cfg
Hit Ctrl F
Search “your item” with spaces as “_”
Once you find it scroll to the right.
the first three numbers are the price
first number is how much you buy for
second number is how much you sell for
third number is how much you alch for/something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Price Help

item.description:

Prices
How can I change the Prices of objects in a shop?
for example;
Dragon Dagger: current cost 19k
Dragon Dagger: (my price) new price cost 35k

Selling Price

thank you
